org.jgrapes.io.util

Class ManagedByteBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.io.util.ManagedBuffer<java.nio.ByteBuffer>
      • org.jgrapes.io.util.ManagedByteBuffer

  • public class ManagedByteBuffer
extends ManagedBuffer<java.nio.ByteBuffer>
    A specialized ManagedBuffer<ByteBuffer> that provides the same methods as ByteBuffer by delegating to the backing buffer.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.jgrapes.io.util.ManagedBuffer

        backing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManagedByteBuffer(byte[] array)
      Creates new managed buffer that is backed by a ByteBuffer that wraps the given array.
      ManagedByteBuffer(byte[] array, int offset, int length)
      Creates new managed buffer that is backed by a ByteBuffer that wraps the given sub array.
      ManagedByteBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer, BufferCollector manager)
      Creates new managed buffer that is backed by the given buffer and managed by the given manager.

        manager - the manager

      • ManagedByteBuffer

        public ManagedByteBuffer(byte[] array)
        Creates new managed buffer that is backed by a ByteBuffer that wraps the given array.
        Parameters:
        array - the byte array

      • ManagedByteBuffer

        public ManagedByteBuffer(byte[] array,
                         int offset,
                         int length)
        Creates new managed buffer that is backed by a ByteBuffer that wraps the given sub array.
        Parameters:
        array - the byte array
        offset - the offset of the sub array to be wrapped
        length - the length of the sub array to be wrapped
